title: Hard Rock Soundtracks
description: 13 explosive tracks in the style of hard rock, electro punk, and big beat. From the bright representative of the modern scene of broken rhythms - Devil Dragon Tatoo.
longDescription:
13 explosive tracks in the style of hard rock, electro punk, and big beat. From the bright representative of the modern scene of broken rhythms - Devil Dragon Tatoo. This can brighten up the aggressive sound of your project, be it races in the style of a derby, or a hard shooter.

Only real sound, only hardcore!

Tracklist:

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Helish

Devil Dragon Tatoo - In Hell

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Rock Harder

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Rock This Place

Betelgeuze - We Can Do (Devil Dragon Tatoo Rework)

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Electro Punk

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Elevator

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Big Dady

Devil Dragon Tatoo - M.W.

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Clutter

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Open-Closed Space

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Rain Does Not Wash Away All Traces (Instrumental)

Devil Dragon Tatoo - Origin
